Class for managing access to local/remote AWS

__getattr__(item)¶

Lazy loading of the boto client. Is stored in a function object that is called in __getattr__

Parameters:

item (str) – the attribute to get

Returns:

the attribute

Return type:

object

createBucket(bucketName)¶

Create a named bucket to put stuff in. Should only be used freely for minio!

Parameters:

bucketName (Str) – Name of the bucket

Returns:

Success or error

Return type:

Bool or Error

uploadFile(fileKey, file, isPublicFile: bool = False)¶

Upload a binary in-memory file to storage.

Parameters:

  • fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

  • file (BytesIO InMemoryFile) – InMemory BytesIO object containing a file

Returns:

Success or error

Return type:

Bool or Error

uploadFileObject(fileKey, file, config=None)¶

Upload a binary in-memory file like object to storage. :param fileKey: the key with which to retrieve the file again later :type fileKey: str :param file: the file like object to be uploaded - should have a read method :type file: object :param config: the configuration for the upload (see boto3 documentation) :type config: dict :return: Pass through of the boto3 upload_fileobj response :rtype: dict

downloadFile(fileKey, decrypt: bool = True) → tuple[io.BytesIO, bool]¶

Download a binary in-memory file to storage.

Parameters:

fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

Returns:

File or error

Return type:

BytesIO or Error

getFileObject(fileKey)¶

Get the file object from storage.

Parameters:

fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later in combination with the bucket name

Returns:

( FileObject or None , true if successful)

Return type:

( object, bool )

getFileStreamingBody(fileKey) → tuple[botocore.response.StreamingBody, bool]¶

Get the file object stream from storage.

Parameters:

fileKey (str) – the key with which to retrieve the file again later

Returns:

( the objects streaming body or None , true if successful)

Return type:

( StreamingBody, bool )

copyFile(inPath: str, outPath: str)¶

Copy a file inside the same bucket

Parameters:

  • inPath (str) – The file to be copied

  • outPath (str) – The new file path

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None

deleteFile(fileKey)¶

Parameters:

fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

Returns:

File or error

Return type:

BytesIO or Error

getContentOfBucket(prefix)¶

Retrieve the content of a certain bucket from the storage.

Parameters:

prefix (str) – The prefix of the folder

Returns:

Dictionary of files

Return type:

Dict
